The pure class interface. 
public class ZirpContentTypes
This class defines constants for content types related to ZIRP.

Author:
Wolfgang Grieskamp (wg@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: ZirpContentTypes.pizza,v 1.1.1.1 1998/09/01 10:51:19 wg Exp $
See also:

ZirpContentTypes
public ZirpContentTypes();

uncheckedAbsy
public static final ContentType uncheckedAbsy;
The content type of the abstract syntax of an unchecked (parsed) unit. Its symbolic name is "unchecked-absy", its content class UnitAbsy.

See also:
UnitAbsy

checkedAbsy

public static final ContentType checkedAbsy;
The content type of the abstract syntax a checked (parsed and type-checked) unit. Its symbolic name is "checked-absy", its content class UnitAbsy.

For a checked absy, the following annotations may be asserted:

  • each NameAppl which represents a generic name defines the Act slot
  • each Expr defines the Type slot
  • each Item defines the Used slot
checked-absy subsumes unchecked-absy, and may be delivered where last one has been queried.

See also:
UnitAbsy

uncheckedEnv

public static final ContentType uncheckedEnv;
The content type of the environment of an unchecked (parsed) unit Its symbolic name is "unchecked-env", its content class UnitEnv.

An "unchecked" environment contains all macro and fixity declarations of a unit and those units which are parents of the given unit. It does not necessarily contains constant declarations.

See also:
UnitEnv

checkedEnv

public static final ContentType checkedEnv;
The content type of the environment of a checked (parsed and type-checked) unit. Its symbolic name is "checked-env", its content class UnitEnv.

An "checked" environment contains all macro, fixity, and constant declarations of a unit and those units which are parents of the given unit.

"checked-absy" subsumes "unchecked-absy", and may be delivered where last one has been queried.

See also:
UnitEnv
